origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'SonyAPI.get_research_investment', 'description': 'This function retrieves the research and development investment data for a specified company over a given number of years, focusing on specific technologies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company, e.g., Sony.'}, {'name': 'years', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of years to retrieve data for.'}, {'name': 'technology_focus', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of technologies to focus on, e.g., image_sensors, semiconductor_technology.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'investment_data', 'description': 'The research and development investment data for the specified company and technologies.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 SonyAPI.get_research_investment, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'Sony', 'years'是'5', 'technology_focus'是['image_sensors', 'semiconductor_technology'].
